predicate.note: Frames file for 'ford' based on sentences in ULA written. No Verbnet entry; comparison with 'cross.'

roleset.name: cross a river at a ford

example.name: transitive
example.text: Their curiosity pushed them-1 *PRO*-1 to build vessels that-2 were strong enough *PRO*-2 to ford the open seas and reach these lands.
